sen.e: The Kyoto City Heiankyo Sosei-Kan Museum exhibits the reconstruction model of Heian-kyo (1/1000, Kyoiki/Oto/Kitayama areas), the reconstruction model of Buraku-den Hall (1/20), the reconstruction model of the Shibi at Buraku-den Hall (life size) and many other excavated articles from the Heian period.
